long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This ADP-compatible extension calculates the clock-out time for individuals seeking to achieve a certain amount of daily hours. Accounts for lunch breaks. Compatible only with ADP.
